snippet.title: DARKGEMS | Xbox Series X Gameplay
snippet.description:
A short round of DARKGEMS. If you're looking for quick & easy achievements this is the game for you but I wouldn't recommend it otherwise. The game has 3 stacks and will receive title updates.

DARKGEMS is a cartoony mining rogue-lite game set in the deep gemstone caverns. Journey through three randomly generated map kinds filled with zombies, ghosts and demons. Keep an eye on your rapidly ending energy supply - one cannot survive in the dark dungeon without a light.

Release date March 22nd 2024
Published by Xeneder Team
Developed by Xeneder Team

Review copy was provided free of charge.
